name: CQL
title: Using CQL with FHIR
description: This implementation guide defines profiles, operations and guidance for the use of CQL with FHIR, both as a mechanism for querying, as well as inline and integrated usage as part of knowledge artifacts.

resource.description: Example cohort definition for anteantal care
resource.name: ANC Cohort

resource.description: The CQL Capability Statement Profile enables capability statements to express supported CQL versions.
resource.name: CQL Capability Statement

resource.description: The $cql operation evaluates a CQL expression and returns the result. The operation has a single return parameter that can be of any type to accommodate the possible result types of a CQL expression.
resource.name: CQL CQL

resource.description: The CQL Evaluation Result profile supports using the dataAbsentReason extension to indicate null evaluation results from operations.
resource.name: CQL Evaluation Result

resource.description: Capability statement for a service supporting CQL evaluation use cases
resource.name: CQL Evaluation Service

resource.description: Example CQL Library illustrating the CQL Profile (a Library with only text/cql content)
resource.name: CQL Example

resource.description: This code system contains example content used to support examples in the Using CQL IG
resource.name: CQL IG Example Code System

resource.description: Supports the description of model info configuration information as part of an implementation guide
resource.name: CQL ImplementationGuide

resource.description: This implementation guide demonstrates the use of modelinfo settings
resource.name: CQL ImplementationGuide Example

resource.description: The CQL Library profile defines conformance expectations for the use of a FHIR Library resource as a wrapper for a Clinical Quality Language (CQL) library
resource.name: CQL Library

resource.description: Evaluates the contents of a library and returns the results as a Parameters resource.
resource.name: CQL Library Evaluate

resource.description: The CQL Model Information profile supports the FHIR representation and distribution of CQL ModelInfo such as the FHIR Model Info Library
resource.name: CQL Model Info

resource.description: CQL ModelInfo settings expressed using FHIR Parameters
resource.name: CQL Model Info Settings

resource.description: The CQL Module profile describes the elements used to provide a structured representation of the declarations and data requirements of a logic library or operation
resource.name: CQL Module

resource.description: A parameters profile that defines supported CQL-to-ELM translator options used to translate CQL. Complete documentation of these options can be found in the [Usage](https://github.com/cqframework/clinical_quality_language/blob/v3.9.0/Src/java/cql-to-elm/OVERVIEW.md#usage) topic of the CQL-to-ELM translator overview.
resource.name: CQL Options

resource.description: Supports configuration of model info information for a StructureDefinition
resource.name: CQL StructureDefinition

resource.description: Before each contact, the health worker should check whether the woman has any of the danger signs listed here â€“ if yes, she should refer to the hospital urgently; if no, she should continue to the normal contact
resource.name: Danger signs

resource.description: Example ELM library demonstrating the ELM XML and ELM JSON profiles (a CQL library with only ELM)
resource.name: ELM Example

resource.description: The ELM Library supports distributing a Clinical Quality Language (CQL) library compiled to Expression Logical Model (ELM) in JSON format
resource.name: ELM JSON Library

resource.description: The ELM CQL Library supports distributing a Clinical Quality Language (CQL) library compiled to Expression Logical Model (ELM) in XML format
resource.name: ELM XML Library

resource.description: Example CQL Library used to demonstrate common patterns used in CQL with FHIR-based models
resource.name: Example

resource.description: Example Parameters resource demonstrating the use of the CQLOptions profile to specify CQL translator options. This resource would typically be a contained resource in an implementation guide, artifact collection, or library.
resource.name: Example CQL Operations Parameters

resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Danger Signs - Central cyanosis element
resource.name: Example Danger Signs - Central cyanosis Codes

resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Danger Signs - No danger signs element
resource.name: Example Danger Signs - No danger signs Codes

resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Danger signs element
resource.name: Example Danger signs Codes

resource.description: Group Valueset with codes representing possible values for the Danger signs Codes Grouper element
resource.name: Example Danger signs Codes Grouper

resource.description: Example Parameters resource demonstrating the use of data-absent-reason extension to indicate a null evaluation result.
resource.name: Example Evaluation Result Parameters

resource.description: This library is used as an example module definition in the Using FHIR with CQL Implementation Guide
resource.name: Example Logic Library - Module Definition

resource.description: Example Parameters resource demonstrating the use of ModelInfo configuration parameters. This resource would typically be a contained resource in an implementation guide or artifact collection.
resource.name: Example ModelInfo Settings Parameters

resource.description: Example Observation resource illustrating negation and the use of the `notDoneValueSet` extension.
resource.name: Example Negation Observation

resource.description: Example Patient resource used as part of the observation negation example.
resource.name: Example Patient

resource.description: Codes representing possible values for the Specific health concern(s) element
resource.name: Example Specific health concern(s) Codes

resource.description: Example Parameters resource showing the result of evaluating the TypeMappingExample library, demonstrating all possible CQL-to-FHIR type mappings.
resource.name: Example Type Mapping Evaluation Result Parameters

resource.description:
Basic conformance statement for a Library Evaluation Service. A server can support more functionality
   than defined here, but this is the minimum amount
resource.name: Library Evaluation Service Capability Statement Example

resource.description: Example CQL library with a parameter defined, used to illustrate calling the $cql and Library/$evaluate operations with libraries that have parameters
resource.name: Parameter Example

resource.description: If the woman came to the facility with a specific health concern, select the health concern(s) from the list
resource.name: Specific health concern(s)

resource.description: Example CQL library providing a complete set of expressions that cover all possible CQL and FHIR Type Mapping, for both input and output. See the Type Mapping Evaluation Result example for an illustration of the type mapping in a Parameters resource.
resource.name: Type Mapping Example

resource.description: Model definition for USCore (v3.1.0) Model
resource.name: USCore Model Definition
